pkgmetadata.longdescription: PAC-Bayesian Estimation and Prediction in Sparse Additive Models. // This package is intended to perform estimation and prediction in high-dimensional additive models, using a sparse PAC-Bayesian point of view and a MCMC algorithm. The method is fully described in Guedj and Alquier (2013), 'PAC-Bayesian Estimation and Prediction in Sparse Additive Models', Electronic Journal of Statistics, 7, 264--291.
